metadata.author: Dr Manuel Corpas
metadata.title: Diversity Reporting Audit: UK Cancer Genomics 2020-2025
metadata.description: Systematic audit of ancestry/ethnicity reporting in UK cancer genomics publications

researchQuestion: What proportion of peer-reviewed UK cancer genomics publications (2020-2025) report participant ancestry or ethnicity, and how is diversity information reported when present?

searchMethodology.searchString: ("United Kingdom"[Affiliation] OR "UK"[Affiliation] OR "England"[Affiliation] OR "Scotland"[Affiliation] OR "Wales"[Affiliation]) AND (cancer[Title/Abstract] OR neoplasm[Title/Abstract] OR tumour[Title/Abstract] OR tumor[Title/Abstract]) AND ("whole genome"[Title/Abstract] OR "whole exome"[Title/Abstract] OR WGS[Title/Abstract] OR WES[Title/Abstract] OR GWAS[Title/Abstract] OR "genome-wide"[Title/Abstract] OR genomic[Title/Abstract]) AND ("2020"[Date - Publication] : "2025"[Date - Publication]) AND Journal Article[pt] AND English[lang]
searchMethodology.validationNote: Humans[MeSH] filter excluded due to delayed indexing of recent papers (PMID 40513586 lacked MeSH indexing)
